mapper.select: SELECT REQSEQ AS "ReqSeq" , REQTYPE AS "ReqType" , AR.UR_CODE AS "UserCode" , AR.REQDATA AS "ReqData" , AR.COMPANYCODE AS "CompanyCode" , AR.REQGUBUN AS "ReqGubun" , ( SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MULTIDISPLAYNAME) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE USERCODE = AR.UR_CODE ) AS "URName" , REQTITLE AS "ReqTitle" , "Comment" AS "Comment" , REQSTATUS AS "ReqStatus" , REQDATE AS "ReqDate" , Fn_GetBaseCodeName('0', 'AttendReqGubun', AR.ReqGubun) AS "ReqGubunName" , Fn_GetBaseCodeName('0', 'AttendReqType', AR.ReqType) AS "ReqName" , Fn_GetBaseCodeName('0', 'AttendState', AR.ReqStatus) AS "StatusName" , REQMETHOD AS "ReqMethod" , BG.DEPTNAME AS "DeptName" , AR.APPROVALCODE AS "ApprovalCode" , AR.APPROVALDATE AS "ApprovalDate" , AR.APPROVALCOMMENT AS "ApprovalComment" , ( SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(NULL, MULTIDISPLAYNAME) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE USERCODE = AR.APPROVALCODE ) AS "ApprovalName" , aj.SchSeq "SchSeq" , aj.WorkZone "WorkZone" , aj.WorkAddr "WorkAddr" , aj.WorkPointX "WorkPointX" , aj.WorkPointY "WorkPointY" FROM ATTEND_REQUEST AR LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP BG ON AR.UR_CODE = BG.USERCODE AND BG.JOBTYPE = 'Origin' LEFT JOIN attend_job aj ON aj.JobDate = to_date(substr(to_char(ReqDate ,'yyyymmddhh24miss'),0,8),'yyyymmdd') AND ar.UR_Code = aj.UserCode WHERE REQSEQ = #{ReqSeq}

SELECT TARGETDATE AS "TargetDate" ,#{UserName} AS "UserName"
, TO_CHAR(EXTENSTART, 'HH24:MI') AS "StartTime" , TO_CHAR(EXTENEND, 'HH24:MI') AS "EndTime" , EXTENREAL AS "RealWorkTime" , EXTENAC AS "RealACTime"
, TO_CHAR(HOLISTART, 'HH24:MI') AS "StartTime" , TO_CHAR(HOLIEND, 'HH24:MI') AS "EndTime" , HOLIREAL AS "RealWorkTime" , HOLIAC AS "RealACTime"
FROM ATTEND_COMMUTING_MST WHERE TARGETDATE = #{JobDate} AND COMPANYCODE = #{CompanyCode} AND USERCODE = #{UserCode}
